' updateOwnedById.vb.txt CVS/Solutions/Solutions/Project/Methods Revision 1.2 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
Dim conn As Aras.Server.Core.InnovatorDatabase = CCO.Variables.InnDatabase Dim projectItem As XmlElement = Me.dom.DocumentElement
Dim projectOwnedById As String = CCO.XML.GetItemProperty(projectItem,"owned_by_id") Dim wbsId As String = CCO.XML.GetItemProperty(projectItem,"wbs_id")
Dim inDom As XmlDocument = CCO.XML.CreateXMLDocument() Dim outDom As XmlDocument = CCO.XML.CreateXMLDocument()
inDom.LoadXML("<Item type='WBS Element' id='" & System.Security.SecurityElement.Escape(wbsId) & "'/>")
CCO.GetItem.GetItem(inDom,outDom)
Dim wbsItem As XmlElement = CCO.XML.GetResponseItem(outDom)
Dim wbsOwnedById As String = CCO.XML.GetItemProperty(wbsItem,"owned_by_id")
Dim WbsElementIDsToUpdate As String = "" Dim Activity2IDsToUpdate As String = ""
Dim wbsIDs As ArrayList = New ArrayList()
Dim rs As Aras.Server.Core.InnovatorDataSet
If projectOwnedById<>wbsOwnedById Then Dim tmpWbsId As String Dim sql As String wbsIDs.Add(wbsId) wbsId = If(string.IsNullOrEmpty(wbsId), wbsId, wbsId.Replace("'", "''")) WbsElementIDsToUpdate = "'" & wbsId & "'" Do tmpWbsId = wbsIDs.Item(0) wbsIDs.RemoveAt(0) tmpWbsId = If(string.IsNullOrEmpty(tmpWbsId), tmpWbsId, tmpWbsId.Replace("'", "''")) sql = "SELECT id1 FROM " & _ "(SELECT wbs.id id1,sub.id id2 FROM sub_wbs sub LEFT JOIN (SELECT id FROM wbs_element) wbs " & _ "ON (wbs.id=sub.related_id) " & _ "WHERE sub.source_id = '" & tmpWbsId & "') res" rs = conn.ExecuteSelect(sql)
While Not rs.Eof() Dim wbsRes As String = rs.Value(0) wbsRes = If(string.IsNullOrEmpty(wbsRes), wbsRes, wbsRes.Replace("'", "''")) WbsElementIDsToUpdate += ",'" & wbsRes & "'" wbsIDs.Add(wbsRes) rs.MoveNext() End While
sql = "SELECT id1 FROM " & _ "(SELECT act.id id1,sub.id id2 FROM wbs_activity2 sub LEFT JOIN (SELECT id FROM activity2) act " & _ "ON (act.id=sub.related_id) " & _ "WHERE sub.source_id = '" & tmpWbsId & "') res" rs = conn.ExecuteSelect(sql)
While Not rs.Eof() Dim actRes As String = rs.Value(0) If Activity2IDsToUpdate.Length <> 0 Then Activity2IDsToUpdate += "," actRes = If(string.IsNullOrEmpty(actRes), actRes, actRes.Replace("'", "''")) Activity2IDsToUpdate += "'" & actRes & "'" rs.MoveNext() End While
Loop While wbsIDs.Count > 0
projectOwnedById = If(string.IsNullOrEmpty(projectOwnedById), projectOwnedById, projectOwnedById.Replace("'", "''")) sql = "UPDATE wbs_element SET owned_by_id='" & projectOwnedById & "' WHERE id IN (" & WbsElementIDsToUpdate & ")" conn.ExecuteSQL(sql)
If Activity2IDsToUpdate.Length > 0 sql = "UPDATE activity2 SET owned_by_id='" & projectOwnedById & "' WHERE id IN (" & Activity2IDsToUpdate & ")" conn.ExecuteSQL(sql) End If
End If
